name: Crazy Soccer (MK_Codes)
description:
Crazy Soccer 

A crazy game made in Godot

CONTROLS NORMAL PLAY

RED TEAM

W/S ---- Move up/down for goalie

T/G ---- Move up/down for forward player

F/H ---- Move left/right for forward player

Y ---- Dash for forward player

BLUE TEAM

Up Arrow/Down Arrow ---- Move up/down for goalie

I/K ---- Move up/down for forward player

J/L ---- Move left/right for forward player

O ---- Dash for forward player

CONTROLS AI PLAY

W/A ---- Move up/down for goalie

Up Arrow/Down Arrow ---- Move up/down for forward player

Left Arrow/Right Arrow ---- Move left/right for forward player

Shift ---- Dash for forward player
